node.title: For regional live music venues a surprising new trend has emerged — optimism
node.alt: Woman on small wooden stage with guitar performs to outdoor seated audience sitting in shade
node.description: There's cause for hope for regional live music as a collision of pandemic by-products make an old-fashioned country gig circuit more viable.
node.content:
["Pat Furze can not quite remember when he last put on a gig.\u00a0", "\"What year is it?\" the Castlemaine pub owner chuckles.", "\"Eurgh, it's been\u00a0awhile.\"\u00a0", "It turns out it was just before Victoria's last big lockdown.", "Since then it has\u00a0been a disorientating blur of home-delivered parmas and running the Bridge Hotel at a loss while trying to keep staff employed.\u00a0", "", "
Pat Furze co-owns the Bridge Hotel in Castlemaine in north-west Victoria.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "Even when his country pub reopened as Melbourne stayed locked down, the prospect of putting on live music, central to the business and the venue's identity, seemed remote.\u00a0", "\"When the Victorian government first released its roadmap\u00a0there was\u00a0nothing even vaguely workable for music venues\u00a0because the vast, vast majority of shows happen indoors,\" Mr Furze said.", "\"It was a lot of doom and gloom amongst venue owners across the state.\"", "Then\u00a0out of seemingly nowhere \u2014 though that underplays the immense lobbying efforts of the Save Our Scene live music campaign\u00a0\u2014\u00a0an unusually bright ray of hope.", "An announcement that venues could operate at full capacity once the state reaches 90 per cent\u00a0double-vaccination rate was an instant scene-changer.", "Within a week, The Bridge Hotel was hosting a state government-supported gig in its beer garden.\u00a0", "In less than a month, it will be able to host full-capacity shows inside.\u00a0", "\"It's great the government is putting on some shows, but all most venues want to do is just stand on their own two feet,\" Mr Furze said.", "The first gig back at the Bridge Hotel on the last weekend of October felt shockingly normal.", "There was still some fumbling of phones, to show vaccination statuses, and fidgeting with masks stepping in and out of the pub.", "But as the sun hit its small beer garden stage, a discernible sense of optimism washed over the venue.", "", "
The outdoor gig was the first the Bridge Hotel had held in almost six months.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "\"It seems strange to say, but overall\u00a0our prospects are looking really good,\" Mr Furze said.\u00a0", "
Industry draws breath after devastating year
", "", "
The Theatre Royal in Castlemaine.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "It is not necessarily a comfortable feeling for anyone involved in live music to outwardly express positivity.", "The last two years in Victoria have been, by and large, devastating.", "Venues have closed, artists\u00a0have left the industry, and those still in it will wear financial bruising for some time to come.\u00a0", "\"It's been very grim,\" said Tim Heath, co-owner of the nearby Theatre Royal on Castlemaine's main strip.\u00a0", "\"It's been tough financially, it's been tough emotionally, and trying to keep up with the new rules has been fairly anxiety inducing. It's been a pretty tiring couple years.\"", "", "
Tim Heath co-owns the Theatre Royal with his partner Felicity Cripps.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "Like their near neighbours at the Bridge Hotel though, the owners of the Theatre Royal have succumbed to a cautious optimism.", "The theatre's wall of posters of since-cancelled shows will soon be updated with rescheduled dates as gigs are frantically rebooked to make the most of a far more promising summer.", "\"Once we can go back to 100 per cent\u00a0capacity there's going to be an absolute plethora of bands playing.\"", "", "
Felicity Cripps and Tim Heath are waiting to welcome back live music to the Theatre Royal.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "A further cause for hope first began to emerge earlier in the year\u00a0when several unintended by-products of the pandemic collided.\u00a0", "With no major festivals, and a lack of international touring opportunities or support slots from visiting bands, Victoria's regional towns briefly became fertile ground for artists seeking a financial alternative.\u00a0", "\"They can't do five shows in Melbourne, so they might do two there and three regionally,\" Mr Health said,", "\"We have seen a regional touring circuit really beginning to gel\u00a0and it seemed like bands could play five regional venues without stealing each other's audiences.\u00a0", "\"It's really great for the town to bring people in to see these shows\u00a0because the economic flow-on effect is great for accommodation, for local cafes, and traders.", "\"They really do notice when a big show is on.\"", "", "
A young family at a regional live music gig.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "The prospect of not just attracting more bands, but higher profile artists as well, became a reality.", "\"We noticed we were able to get artists that were really big names for us, that would normally be touring overseas\u00a0or playing large indoor venues, but they were coming to the regions because they could play a show,\" said Mr Furze of the Bridge Hotel.\u00a0", "
Country gig circuit revival
", "", "
Jess Ribeiro moved to regional Victoria earlier this year.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "During a window in early 2021, several local tours emerged with shows spanning Victoria's eastern Gippsland region, further north in Beechworth, and down to the state's south-west coastline.", "It was an old-fashioned concept, but one that appealed to artists like Jess Ribeiro.\u00a0", "It is\u00a0still fraught, but an Australian touring circuit dotted with an increasing\u00a0number of regional and country towns would make the prospect of working as an artist ever slightly more viable.", "", "
Jess Ribeiro says being able to do regional shows represents \"survival\".(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "\"You just start to reconsider things when we've been through this pandemic,\" Ms\u00a0Ribeiro said, who like many others moved to regional Victoria earlier this year.", "\"We really are going to have to re-imagine the way that we play music and where we play in the future.", "\"There is a big space there for all of these regional spots.", "\"Hopefully that becomes the case\u00a0because I think\u00a0a lot of these places have always had the venues.\"", "", "
It's hoped the wave of people moving to regional Australia\u00a0will help make live music more sustainable.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "As people find themselves able to work remotely but increasingly priced out of the city, there is hope the wave of migration to regional Australia could help make such a touring circuit more sustainable.", "At live music venue The Eastern in Ballarat, 110 kilometres\u00a0west of Melbourne, booker Nick Murnane is coming to the end of another 70-hour week spent largely on the phone to bands and agents.", "He is\u00a0daunted but overwhelming excited about the months of live music ahead.\u00a0", "\"After what we've gone through\u00a0we really know now to value it and make the most out of all the opportunities we can get and just sort of run with it,\" Mr Murnane said.\u00a0", "\"But I wouldn't do anything else. I don't think I'm wired for anything else.", "\"It has to work, otherwise I'm back to stacking shelves at Coles.\""]
